attributes.action: Remove VAT of domestic flood prevention equipment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People residing in flood-prone areas are forced to purchase flood- protection barriers to protect their homes. They must pay VAT on such items. In most cases, increased flooding risk is a consequence of land development, directed by Central Government, which affects natural drainage via traditional river systems. Remove the VAT charges for domestic flood protection equipment.
